About

I'm a graduate student at University of Minnesota, Twin Cities and currently pursuing PhD in computer science (Fall 2015 - Present). My interest lies in field of machine learning including but not limited to deep learning, feature learning, manifold learning and optimization.

You can contact me: verma@cs.umn.edu
